[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [RushConstants](./rush-lib.rushconstants.md) &gt; [pnpmPatchesCommonFolderName](./rush-lib.rushconstants.pnpmpatchescommonfoldername.md)

## RushConstants.pnpmPatchesCommonFolderName property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The folder name under `/common/temp` used to store checked-in patches. Example: `C:\MyRepo\common\pnpm-patches`

**Signature:**

```typescript
static readonly pnpmPatchesCommonFolderName: `pnpm-patches`;
```
